
#Workspace for Project 2

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(flextable)
library(sf)
library(tigris)
library(tmap)
library(RColorBrewer)
```


```{r}
PAD_CA_sf <- st_as_sf(PAD_CA, wkt = "WKT")

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = PAD_CA_sf, aes(fill = mang_level)) +
  labs(fill = "Management Level") +
  theme_void()


fires_sf <- fires %>%
  filter(!is.na(WKT)) %>%
  st_as_sf(wkt = "WKT")

fires_sf_2010 <- fires_sf %>% 
  filter(discover_yr == 2010)

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = fires_sf, aes(fill = cause_gen)) +
  labs(fill = "Incident Cause (general)") +
  theme_void()
```
